directions: Bring first 6 ingredients to a boil in a saucepan. Stir in shredded chicken and green onions.
Combine beans and salsa. Spoon 1/4 cup bean mixter and 1/2 cup chicken mixture down center of each tortilla; sprinkle with 2 tablespoons cheese. Roll up.

Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Coat pan with cooking spray. Add 2 burritos. Place a cast-iron or other heavy skillet on top and cook for 3 minutes on each side. Repeat with remaining 2 burritos.
title: Chicken and Black Bean-Stuffed Burritos
